name: wiseCampaign
author: rubyat13

sections.description:
wiseCampaign is a top bar marketing campaign plugin that helps sellers promote their product discounts. This plugin is for everyone who wants to sell products or services.

ðŸ‘‰ Official Free Demo Link: Official Demo
ðŸ‘‰ Details documentation of installation and usage instruction can be find on Link: https://wisemattic.com/docs/

Usage Instructions

  1. Go to WiseCampaign -> Settings, toggle the status to Active to activate the banner, and select a template from the list of views. Then, click the Save button.

  2. Go to Appearance -> Customize -> wiseCampaign to customize all the properties of the campaign banner.

Source Code

Folder structure of the source code is given below:
– wisecampaign/
– wisecampaign.php: This is the main plugin file, where the plugin initialization starts.
– includes/: Contains additional PHP files that support the plugin functionality.
– pages/: Contains the source code for the Getting Started and Settings pages. The source is written using the Vue framework.
– distpages/: Contains the compiled output of the pages/ folder, making it non-human-readable.
– frontend/: Contains the source code for the main view of the plugin, which is a customizable banner displayed at the top of the page. The source is written using the Vue framework.
– dist/: Contains the compiled output of the frontend/ folder, making it non-human-readable.
– readme.txt: Provides a basic overview of the project.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and place the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation. Then activate the plugin from the Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Q. Who should use wiseCampaign?

A. This plugin is for everyone who wants to sell products or services.

Q. What are the requirements to use wiseCampaign?

A. You only need to have the latest version of WordPress on your website to begin with. wiseCampaign is essentially an addon for the default WordPress editor. Therefore, the latest WordPress installation along with a theme should be enough to get started.
